title: Manage My Day – AI Productivity App
details: AI-powered productivity app with daily task, project, and goal management.
Custom calendar with drag/drop, recurring events, and calendar sync (Google, iOS, Microsoft).
Live timers integrated with Dynamic Island & lockscreen widgets.
AI assistant built using FastAPI + Google Agent Development Kit.

title: Crooze & AgreEasy Mobile Apps
details: Crooze: Fitness challenge app with community challenges, leaderboards, and certificates.
AgreEasy: B2B agriculture platform for farmers and restaurants with localization and bidding.

title: SimbaCourse Mobile App
details: Education management app for admins, teachers, and students.
